trans-unit.source: Represents a class that provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragDrop*>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnDragEnter*>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnDragOver*> events in the workflow designer.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] These event arguments are passed to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes when a drag-and-drop operation is in progress on the workflow design surface.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes can access the information contained in the ActivityDragEventArgs class to influence the behavior of the operation.
Gets a collection of activities upon which a drag-and-drop operation is performed.
A read-only collection that contains all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> objects on which the drag-and-drop operation is performed.
Gets or sets the location where the activities are to be dropped on the workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> class creates a drag image for the activities being dragged.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> objects can use the DragImageSnapPoint property to snap the image to a target and drop the activities at the specified location.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the activities will be dropped.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> on the workflow design surface where a drag operation began.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the location on the workflow design surface where the drag operation began.
